mapper.select: select memberId, name, email from member
select memberId, memberPassword , name, email , phoneNumber , age , signUpDate from member where memberId = #{memberId}
select permission from permission where memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into member (memberId, memberPassword , name, email , phoneNumber , age , signUpDate) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword} , #{name}, #{email} , #{phoneNumber} , #{age} , (sysdate))
insert into permission ( no , memberId , permission) values ( NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{memberId} , #{permission})
mapper.update: update permission set permission = #{permission} where memberId = #{memberId}
